name: DreamShock DEMO
description:
A BATTLE WITH AN EVIL CLONE IN A RACE AGAINST TIME!

When a mysterious figure identical to him shows up and wreaks havoc during the Festival of Harmony in Stick City, Rian gives chase to clear his name and find out who this imposter works for!

Blast through the forces of your evil clone in this brand new high speed platformer!

 An arsenal of different abilities that allows for many creative ways to take down enemies and clear stages in record time!

  A fast paced, rockin' soundtrack, inspired by games of old!

  Fluid animations and colorful, eye catching environments!

  Fast, exciting combat uses quick wits and freedom of movement to outplay and crush the opposition!

Blast through the forces of darkness and uncover the truth about the incident!

The itch.io demo will have updates up to STAGE 3!

For updates on the project, Visit the game's Discord! - https://discord.gg/6CxX9cPcqV
